data.description:
Welcome to Terra Alia, an enchanting realm where technology, magic, and language seamlessly intertwine, bringing a unique take on discovering a new language and making it into an interactive, immersive experience.

üìú Multilingual Mystery: Embark on a journey guided by Professor Esperanto, delving into a world of secrets and puzzles as you search for the missing mentor in Terra Alia's magical academy.

üåê Learn in Ten Languages: Dive into English, Spanish, Italian, French, German, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Chinese, and Brazilian Portuguese.

üí™ Dynamic Leveling: Enhance your abilities by learning new words, unlocking magical items, conversing with other characters, and exploring the world.

üîç Quests & Puzzles: Unravel clues, complete quests, and discover the secret behind Esperanto's disappearance.

üéØ INTERACTIVE & DYNAMIC COMBAT
Experience VR-crafted language-based combat, strategically adapting to diverse enemies.

üåê Multilingual Multiplayer BETA: Gather up to four friends for intense 2vs2 matches in the Downtown level. Test linguistic prowess in three rounds, with matches available in ten languages!

üå≥Terra Buddies! Unleash your inner collector and gather these adorable wooden figures across the gaming realm.

changelog.change_log: - Fixed an issue with old save games where players that previously talked to the Gate Keeper won't be able to give him the Ripstone again after the update.

- Fixed an issue where the save data could be corrupted after not properly completing a new game operation.
- Fixed an issue where sometimes the Spell Wheel selector won't properly highlight the spell selected, which could lead to a freeze in the spell selection.
- Game credits updated.
